text: Gen tte yaru ga i. `Rissho ni oite, mottomo juyona koto wa nanidearu ka.' Itte yaru ga i. `Arra wa, watashi to anata gata to no ma no rissho-sha de ara reru. Kono kuruan ga, watashi ni keiji sa reta no wa, watashi ga anata gata soshite todoku kagiri no mono ni, sore ni yotte keikoku suru tamedearu. Anata gata wa (arra no soto ni) hoka no kami ga aru koto o, shogen dekiru no ka.' Itte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa shogen suru koto wa dekinai.'
